project_abstract.cdata: The objective of the Provincial Universities Project is to assist provincial universities and the State Education Commission (SEdC) to expand enrollment as well as improve the quality and management of higher education programs. The project will have two components: (a) Assistance to Provincial Universities; and (b) Assistance to Higher Education Development. The first component will assist 60 universities by providing for civil works, equipment for teaching and research, curricula reorganization and staff development opportunities. Emphasis will be given to teacher education programs. The second component will assist SEdC and the Provincial Higher Education Bureaux to strengthen their planning and management capacities mainly through provision of technical assistance. Two planning activities which include the higher education masterplan and the teacher demand and supply plans will be supported.

P003443.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>地方大学项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的目标是协助地方大学和国家教育委员会扩大招生规模，提高其高等教育项目质量，加强项目管理。项目设有两个子项目：（1）地方大学援助子项目；（2）高等教育发展援助子项目。第一个子项目将通过土建工程建设、教学研究设备提供、课程改革和教师发展机会向60所大学提供援助。第二个子项目将主要通过提供技术援助，协助国家教育委员会和各省高等教育局增强其规划和管理能力。项目也将资助开展两项规划工作，包括编制高等教育总体规划和教师供需计划。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
